name: AVAudioUnit
desc: A subclass of the audio node class that, processes audio either in real time or nonreal time, depending on the type of the audio unit.

items.name: var audioUnit: AudioUnit
items.desc: The underlying Core Audio audio unit.

items.name: func loadPreset(at: URL)
items.desc: Loads an audio unit using a specified preset.

items.name: class func instantiate(with: AudioComponentDescription, options: AudioComponentInstantiationOptions, completionHandler: (AVAudioUnit?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates an instance of an audio unit component asynchronously and wraps it in an audio unit class.

items.name: var audioComponentDescription: AudioComponentDescription
items.desc: The audio component description that represents the underlying Core Audio audio unit.

items.name: var manufacturerName: String
items.desc: The name of the manufacturer of the audio unit.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the audio unit.

items.name: var version: Int
items.desc: The version number of the audio unit.

items.name: var auAudioUnit: AUAudioUnit
items.desc: The audio unit class wrapping or underlying the implementationâ€™s audio unit.
